file_content.text: Tell me you're alive.
Alive, yes. Intact... mostly.
For the moment.
I'm in the middle of killing Arcann.
Stop bothering me.
The Gravestone is under siege--but we're not leaving without you.
Hold tight. I'm coming.
I'm on my way.
Don't wait for me. I have unfinished business.
You're on your own.
We are your business!
Hey! Shiny! Do us all a favor and get those cannons firing, would ya?
This vessel's targeting algorithms were inferior. I am upgrading them.
That is not a priority right now!
Improvement is always a priority. Activating firing pattern.
I take it all back! That's some good shooting!
Uhh... didn't that just go down near the Scions' hideout? Someone better check up on our Outlander.
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Jedi = save the day!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Barsen'thor = must help!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Major = must help!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Captain = must help!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Sith Lord = must help!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + bounty hunter = must help!
Gravestone = in danger! // T7 + Agent = must help!
Explosion = large // T7 = worried!
